rule: The category label must match exactly one of the terms: World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech, without any variations in spelling, capitalization, or punctuation.
input: FIFA World Cup attracts millions of viewers worldwide
validityText:
The provided input is "FIFA World Cup attracts millions of viewers worldwide." This is a news article text, and it is in English. The content clearly belongs to the category of Sports, satisfying the requirement of being in one of the specified categories (World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech). The sentence provides enough context by mentioning the FIFA World Cup and the viewership details, making it classifiable into the Sports category. Therefore, it meets all the requirements set by the input specification.

OK
